memberdef.name: STEP1
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int c = (l & 0xff) ^ *p++; \ l = kByteExtensionTable[c] ^ (l >> 8); \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: STEP4
memberdef.initializer: do { \ crc##s = ReadUint32LE(p + s * 4) ^ kStrideExtensionTable3[crc##s & 0xff] ^ \ kStrideExtensionTable2[(crc##s >> 8) & 0xff] ^ \ kStrideExtensionTable1[(crc##s >> 16) & 0xff] ^ \ kStrideExtensionTable0[crc##s >> 24]; \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: STEP16
memberdef.initializer: do { \ STEP4(0); \ STEP4(1); \ STEP4(2); \ STEP4(3); \ p += 16; \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: STEP4W
memberdef.initializer: do { \ w ^= l; \ for (size_t i = 0; i < 4; ++i) { \ w = (w >> 8) ^ kByteExtensionTable[w & 0xff]; \ } \ l = w; \ } while (0)
